flawed_nl_solution:
Before her sister took some there were 64/4=<<64/4=16>>16 apples in each basket
After her sister took some each pile had 16-3=<<16-3=15>>15 apples in each basket

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 13, not 15. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
